definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: The conclusion part explained the status and the trend of the Mulao Minority's Yifan festival.
sentences.chinese: 結語部分說明依飯節在仫佬族文化中的地位及走向。

sentences.english: Besides the preface and conclusion, the paper has six chapters.
sentences.chinese: 除了序言和結語外，論文共有六章。

sentences.english: Besides the introduction and peroration, this article contains 5 chapters.
sentences.chinese: 本文除了引言和結語外，在結構上分爲五章。

sentences.english: At the conclusion, the inflexion of the narrative perspective was supplemented.
sentences.chinese: 結語，補敘了嚴格的敘事角度分類之外的變音。

sentences.english: Besides preface and final words, the thesis consists of 3 chapters, about 50,000 Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 除序言和結語外，全文共三章，計5萬餘字。

sentences.english: It is composed of two parts with five chapters apart from the preface and the conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 除前言和結語外，分上下兩篇共五章。

sentences.english: The conclusion sums up the whole thesis and makes an overall statement about the characteristics of the vocabulary of Baoying dialect.
sentences.chinese: 結語部分對正文進行概述，總述寶應方言詞彙的特點。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter is a conclusion, the summary of the entire study.
sentences.chinese: 第六章結語，是對整項研究的一個總結。

sentences.english: In the closing statement, the author re-state his opinions on hedge fund.
sentences.chinese: 在結語部分，筆者重申了對對沖基金看法。

sentences.english: This thesis consists of five chapters of the introduction and main text plus the conclusion totaling about fifty thousand words.
sentences.chinese: 本論文分爲緒論及正文共五章和結語，全文約5萬字。

sentences.english: The concluding part chiefly discusses the promotion of sexual harmony by sexual rights.
sentences.chinese: 結語主要講以性權利促進性和諧。

sentences.english: And the conclusion part summarizes Liansky's character.
sentences.chinese: 結語部分對歌劇中連斯基這個人物進行總結。

sentences.english: This paper has about 35,000 words, it consists of four chapters except for the introduction and conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 全文三萬五千餘字，除前言和結語外，分爲四章。

sentences.english: The last part outline the value and position of Wu' literature creation.
sentences.chinese: 結語部分簡述了吳兆騫文學創作的價值與地位。

sentences.english: In the conclusion, the author restates her views in the previous part of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 在結語部分，對全文進行了概括，重申了本文的觀點。

sentences.english: The conclusion is to summarize the academic point of view of the thesis.
sentences.chinese: 結語部分是對本文學術觀點的歸納。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
a poem/a composition in verse/fig. epic (compared with historical epic)/the biblical Book of Psalms
current politics/political situation of the time
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
regular verse/strict poetic form with eight lines of 5, 6 or 7 syllables and even lines rhyming
